plentry.pd: (1): Left channel mode. In this mode, the right channel audio is replaced with the left channel audio, and you can only hear the left channel.
(2): Right channel mode. In this mode, the left channel audio is replaced with the right channel audio, and you can only hear the right channel.
(3): Mixed channel mode. In this mode, the left and right channel audio are mixed, and you can hear both channels simultaneously.
(0): Original mode, retains original audio from both left and right channels.
(1): Left channel mode, replaces right channel audio with left channel audio. Users hear only the left channel.
(2): Right channel mode, replaces left channel audio with right channel audio. Users hear only the right channel.
(3): Mixed channel mode, mixes left and right channel audio. Users hear both channels simultaneously.
